[Page Title: The Wagon To-Go | SWC Shem Creek Food Trailer in Mount Pleasant — Saltwater Cowboys Waterfront Dining Restaurant in Mount Pleasant]

Back Main Menu Drink Menu Brunch Menu Dog Treat Menu Gazebo Bar Menu To-Go Wagon Menu Back Plan Your Event Event Spaces Event Menus Event Request Form Back Merch + Sauces Gift Cards Back History The Wagon 
The WAGON : SWC TO-GO
PLACE TO-GO ORDER A NEW CREEKSIDE EXPERIENCE IS HERE! WELCOME TO THE WAGON! 
Saltwater Cowboys is bringing the flavor outside with , our new to-go food trailer parked right in our lot on Shem Creek, Mount Pleasant, SC. This isn’t your typical Charleston food truck. The Wagon is a permanent extension of our kitchen, serving up your SWC favorites in a relaxed, grab-and-go setting.
The Wagon 
Roll up in your golf cart from nearby neighborhoods, swing by on your way home and pick up a meal for the entire family or stop by in your car and enjoy sandwiches, tacos, wings, and more - quick, fresh Charleston takeout favorites prepared with “to-go” in mind.

If you want to hang around and enjoy the SWC vibes, grab a seat on Shem Creek in Mount Pleasant. We’ll have a few picnic tables and plenty of fresh air. It’s the perfect spot to kick back creekside without missing a bite.
Meet us at The Wagon! PLACE TO-GO ORDER

— Saltwater Cowboys Waterfront Dining Restaurant in Mount Pleasant] Back Main Menu Drink Menu Brunch Menu Dog Treat Menu Gazebo Bar Menu To-Go Wagon Menu Back Plan Your Event Event Spaces Event Menus Event Request Form Back Merch + Sauces Gift Cards Back History The Wagon Drink Menu Raise a glass on Shem Creek with the Saltwater Cowboys drink menu, featuring handcrafted cocktails, frozen drinks, wines, and local beers. From our signature Dockside Lemonade and craft cocktails to regional wines and coastal-inspired favorites, our Mount Pleasant bar is the perfect spot to enjoy waterfront drinks in Charleston. Whether you’re looking for Shem Creek bars with frozen cocktails, local brews, or sunset spritzers, Saltwater Cowboys delivers the ultimate creekside experience. Come sip your favorite drink by the water and see why Saltwater Cowboys is one of the top Shem Creek bars in Mount Pleasant, SC! Back Main Menu Drink Menu Brunch Menu Dog Treat Menu Gazebo Bar Menu To-Go Wagon Menu Back Plan Your Event Event Spaces Event Menus Event Request Form Back Merch + Sauces Gift Cards Back History The Wagon EVENT MENUS & PACKAGES 
At Saltwater Cowboys, we believe every celebration deserves bold flavors and Southern flair. Our private event menus are served buffet style and built around crowd-pleasing favorites—from smoked meats and seafood to Lowcountry sides and signature starters. With flexible packages and plenty of options to customize, you can build the perfect spread for your group, no matter the size or occasion. to find the perfect location for your next event.
Check out our event space Package Options 
Includes: 2 Appetizers, 1 Entrée, 1 Side
Small – $35 per person 
Includes: 2 Appetizers, 2 Entrées, 2 Sides
Medium – $55 per person 
Includes: 3 Appetizers, 3 Entrées, 3 Sides
Large – $70 per person

MAIN Menu

Explore the Saltwater Cowboys menu, featuring Southern-style seafood, BBQ, and Lowcountry favorites on the waterfront of Shem Creek in Mount Pleasant, SC. From smoked brisket and pulled pork to fried shrimp, tacos, and classic sides, our Charleston waterfront and seafood restaurant serves bold flavors with a laid-back coastal vibe. Whether you’re looking for Shem Creek restaurants with indoor dining or outdoor dockside views, Saltwater Cowboys is the perfect spot to enjoy a true taste of Mount Pleasant.
Dine dockside at Saltwater Cowboys and taste why we’re a favorite among Shem Creek restaurants! Appetizers

[Page Title: Outdoor Gazebo Bar | Saltwater Cowboys | Mount Pleasant — Saltwater Cowboys Waterfront Dining Restaurant in Mount Pleasant]

Back Main Menu Drink Menu Brunch Menu Dog Treat Menu Gazebo Bar Menu To-Go Wagon Menu Back Plan Your Event Event Spaces Event Menus Event Request Form Back Merch + Sauces Gift Cards Back History The Wagon GAZEBO Bar Menu 
Kick back with waterfront views at the Gazebo Bar at Saltwater Cowboys on Shem Creek in Mount Pleasant, SC. Our open-air bar serves creekside cocktails, cold beer, and shareable bites like flatbreads, wings, nachos, and tacos. Whether you’re meeting friends for happy hour, enjoying live music, or looking for the best outdoor bar in Mount Pleasant, the Gazebo Bar delivers laid-back vibes and unbeatable waterfront energy.
Stop by the Gazebo Bar for the best drinks, food, and Shem Creek sunsets, no reservations needed! Flatbreads 
– $16Smoked chicken, mixed cheese, red onions, jalapeños, pineapple, and cilantro; topped with Carolina Gold and Sweet Hickory BBQ sauces

Brunch Menu

Sundays are better with brunch at Saltwater Cowboys on Shem Creek in Mount Pleasant, SC. Join us every Sunday from 10 a.m. to 2 p.m. for a delicious spread of Southern favorites with a Lowcountry twist, including chicken & waffles, breakfast tacos, biscuits, and cinnamon sugar beignets. Pair your plate with a Mimosa Flight or our famous 32oz Bloody Mary Bucket and enjoy the best brunch in Charleston with waterfront views.
Join us every Sunday and experience the best brunch on the waterfront at Saltwater Cowboys! Appetizers

Dog Treat Menu

At Saltwater Cowboys on Shem Creek in Mount Pleasant, SC, we welcome dogs like family! Our dog-friendly restaurant and waterfront patio are the perfect spots for pups to relax while you enjoy Southern food and Lowcountry views. With our special Dog Treat Menu, featuring tail-wagging favorites like pup burgers, ice cream cones, and beefy ales, Saltwater Cowboys is Charleston’s go-to dog-friendly dining destination.
Bring your four-legged friends and discover why Saltwater Cowboys is the best dog-friendly restaurant on Shem Creek with treats for everyone, even the pups!

Welcome to Saltwater Cowboys on Historic Shem Creek

Since 2017, Saltwater Cowboys has been Mount Pleasant’s go-to waterfront restaurant on , known for , slow-smoked BBQ, , and . As one of the top Shem Creek restaurants, we offer a laid-back Lowcountry dining experience with unbeatable marsh and harbor scenery. Whether you're here for oysters, brisket, happy hour, or a night out with friends, our authentic flavors, , and friendly crew make Saltwater Cowboys a favorite for locals and visitors looking for Charleston’s best seafood and BBQ on the water.
historic Shem Creek seafood cold cocktails unforgettable sunset views live music

Shem Creek dining is here all year. From beautiful winter sunsets to warming Southern flavors, Saltwater Cowboys is your go-to restaurant in Charleston for year-round indoor/outdoor dining.
